description: Final state after revert pivot - new sub-issue created for reversion

issue.title: Implement authentication system
issue.body:
Add OAuth2 authentication.

## Requirements

- OAuth2 support
- Session management

## Todos

- [x] Add OAuth2 library
- [x] Create auth endpoints
- [ ] Add rate limiting to auth

subIssues.title: [Reversion] Remove OAuth2 implementation
subIssues.body:
## Description

User requested removal of OAuth2 implementation that was already completed.

## Background

The original implementation added OAuth2 authentication, but it's no longer needed.

## Scope

Remove all OAuth2-related code and dependencies.

## Todos

- [ ] Remove OAuth2 library dependency
- [ ] Remove OAuth2 authentication endpoints
- [ ] Update tests to remove OAuth2 tests
